publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this ! statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1829 Oct. 16
bibl.note: This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This excerpt is from the Friday October 16 and Saturday October 17, 1829 sessions of court. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text control led with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.head: Friday 16th October
div1.p:
Wyckoff Pickens &Co
vs
Andrew Ross &
Elizabeth Pack
Judgment in favour of the plaintiff for twenty one hundred seventy three dollars & sixty nine Cents & Cost of suit-
Recover damages for a certain horse
The court find for the plaintiff fifty dollars and cost of suit to be discharged in good property at valluation - 17th Octr. 1829

p.del: Replevy of property on attachment Say three negroes
The Court find for the plaintiff

p.add: Cost of appeal paid, 21st Octr 1829 Execution issued
Execution issued delivered to Jos. M Lyner N. Marshal Novr. 1829

div1.head: Saturday Octr. 17th
div1.p: The Court find for the plaintiff.
Court Adjourned to monday morning 10 Oclock
